title: Optimizing Customer Retention in Subscription Businesses
summary: This page discusses the critical importance of customer retention and LTV for subscription businesses. It highlights common churn drivers like customer fatigue, competitive loss, and customer service issues, but emphasizes that payment authorization errors are the single largest cause of churn, accounting for up to 48% of lost customers.
key_points: Customer retention and LTV are crucial for subscription business revenue and profitability.
Common churn drivers include customer fatigue, competitive loss, and customer service issues.
Payment authorization errors are the largest, often unrecognized, cause of customer churn (up to 48%).
Addressing payment authorization errors is key to closing the churn gap and improving retention.
